name: webpack-modules-graph-plugin
description: A webpack plugin to generate a graph of the modules in the build

scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "beta version - %s" && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch -m "patch version - %s" && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -m "minor version - %s" && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -m "major version - %s" && npm publish

author: Daniel Amenou <amenou.daniel@gmail.com>
